EnExplanation: A conjunction used to introduce a reason or explanation for something.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma jään koju, sest seal on soe.
Samples.EnSentence: I will stay at home because it is warm there.

Samples.EeSentence: Ma ei tule, sest ma olen haige.
Samples.EnSentence: I am not coming because I am sick.
